lexUnit.name: brother-in-law.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the brother of one's wife or husband, or the husband of one's sister or sister-in-law.

sentence.text: THE brother-in-law of James Guerin , the US industrialist accused of defrauding Ferranti of more than Â£150m , pleaded guilty in US court yesterday to two counts of bribery in America 's WedTech defence scandal .
